execution_plan.description: Retrieve shipped order item IDs together with their shipment dates from the shipments database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT si.order_item_id, s.shipment_date FROM shipment_items si JOIN shipments s ON si.shipment_id = s.shipment_id;

execution_plan.description: Map shipped order items to product IDs using the order items table in the orders database. Uses the order_item_id values returned by step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT order_item_id, product_id FROM Order_Items WHERE order_item_id IN ($step1.order_item_id);

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product names for the product IDs returned by step 2 from the products database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step2.product_id);
